name: HepatitisB
title: Hepatitis B
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent hepatitis B infections.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis. ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with hepatitis B infections. This is a grouping of ICD-10-CM and SNOMED CT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
